com.example.hotpot0.section2.controllers

Class CreateEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hotpot0.section2.controllers.CreateEventHandler

  • public class CreateEventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the creation of new events in the system.

    This class performs validation on event details, creates a new Event, links it to the organizer through EventUserLink, and updates the organizerâ€™s profile.
